name: PREHISTORIC ISLE
description:
Pilot an 1930's airplane, and fight against legions of dinosaurs and cavemen over a tropical island filled with mystery and danger! While collecting Speed Up & Power Up items, beware of the numerous traps that await you in this horizontal side-scrolling shooter released by SNK in 1989!

* 2P gameplay / ad-hoc functionality is not available for this software
